sources.full: Elven Eldar; Elite Elves for Encounters!

entries.name: Battle Focus
entries: You add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

entries.name: Fleet
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet and you may take the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action on your turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The elven avatar of war is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the elven avatar of war or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven avatar of war may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: War Awakened
entries: Friendly creatures within 30 feet of the elven avatar of war are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition, may make one additional attack as a bonus action when they take the {@action Attack} action, and they can deal an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage if they move at least 10ft. towards a creature and hit it with a melee attack.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven avatar of war adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elven avatar of war deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The elven avatar of war's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the elven avatar of war fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The elven avatar of war has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven avatar of war uses its Frightful Presence; it then makes five melee attacks with the wailing doom.

action.name: The Wailing Doom
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) slashing damage, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Molten Beam {@recharge 4}
entries: The elven avatar of war unleashes a beam of fire from its weapon. The beam is 30 feet long, 5 feet wide, each creature in the line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A flammable object hit by this ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.
If the damage from this reduces a target to 0 hit points, it dies instantly; the target and all of its nonmagical belongings are then turned to ash.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the elven avatar of war's choice that is within 120 feet of the elven avatar of war and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the elven avatar of war's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Defense Tactics
entries: When a hostile creature the Dire Avenger can see moves within 10 feet of it, the Dire Avenger may either move up to 10 feet and make a melee attack against the hostile creature if it is within his reach or make one ranged attack against the creature.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven dire avenger adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven dire avenger may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven dire avenger has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven dire avenger to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven dire avenger makes two ranged attacks with its avenger shuriken crossbow.

action.name: Avenger Shuriken Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Defense Tactics
entries: When a hostile creature the exarch can see moves within 10 feet of it, the exarch may either move up to 10 feet and make a melee attack against the hostile creature if it is within his reach or make one ranged attack against the creature.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Battle Fortune
entries: The exarch has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either a twin-linked avenger shuriken crossbow and a dagger, an elven glaive and a shimmershield, or a shuriken hand crossbow and a diresword.

trait.name: Disarming Strike
entries: Once per turn, when the exarch hits a creature with a melee attack they can force them to succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one object of the exarch's choice. The object lands at its feet.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Shimmershield
entries: Affixed to the exarch's gauntlet, the shimmershield provides a +1 bonus to the AC and saving throws of the exarch and each friendly creature within 15 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes two ranged or melee attacks.

action.name: Twin-linked Avenger Shuriken Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage. When making an attack roll with this weapon, the exarch can re-roll one of the dice once. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Elven Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Diresword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage. On a hit, if the target has 50 hit points or fewer it must succeed a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or die instantly, its soul severed from its body.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven striking scorpion adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven striking scorpion may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Silent Hunter
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain does not cost the elven striking scorpion extra feet of movement.
Additionally the elven striking scorpion may hide as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven striking scorpion has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven striking scorpion to sleep.

trait.name: Shrouded
entries: The elven striking scorpion is considered to be in half cover against ranged attacks even if they are in the open. If elven striking scorpion is in cover, it is considered to be one degree more protective; for example if they are in half cover, it is considered to be three-quarters cover.

trait.name: Deadly Sting
entries: At the start of their turn, the elven striking scorpion can use their bonus action to make an attack with their scorpion's sting. Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on this attack's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: Scorpion Sword
entries: This weapon gives a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included below).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven striking scorpion makes two attacks with its scorpion sword.

action.name: Scorpion Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Scorpion's Sting
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 5/10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Silent Hunter
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain does not cost the exarch extra feet of movement.
Additionally the exarch may hide as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Theexarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Shrouded
entries: The exarch is considered to be in half cover against ranged attacks even if they are in the open. If the exarch is in cover, it is considered to be one degree more protective; for example if they are in half cover, it is considered to be three-quarters cover.

trait.name: Deadly Sting
entries: At the start of their turn, the exarch can use their bonus action to make an attack with their scorpion's sting. Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on this attack's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either a biting blade and a scorpion's claw or a pair of scorpion sabres.
The scorpion's claw and scorpion sabres are paired with gauntlet mounted shuriken hand crossbows.

trait.name: Biting Blade
entries: This weapon gives a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included below).

trait.name: Scorpion's Claw
entries: The exarch may add their strength modifier to damage rolls made with this weapon.
Additionally they can hold another weapon with two-hands while armed with this weapon.

trait.name: Monster Hunter
entries: The exarch may re-roll damage die and choose the highest on attacks against creatures that are one or more sizes larger than them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes three attacks melee attacks, two with its biting blade and one with its scorpion's claw or three with its scorpion sabres.
If it is armed with scorpion sabres it may instead make two ranged attacks with its shuriken hand crossbows.

action.name: Biting Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d4 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Scorpion's Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scorpion Sabre
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage. If any of this weapon's damage dice roll their maximum, then the eleven striking scorpion exarch may roll one additional damage die.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Scorpion's Sting
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 5/10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven howling banshee adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven howling banshee may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven howling banshee has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven howling banshee to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven howling banshee uses banshee's howl if it can and then makes two attacks with its elven blade.

action.name: Elven Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Banshee's Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: Each hostile creature within 15 feet of the elven howling banshee must succeed a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Disarming Strike
entries: Once per turn, when the exarch hits a creature with a melee attack they can force them to succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one object of the exarch's choice. The object lands at its feet.

trait.name: Shield of Grace
entries: At the start of their turn, if there is a hostile creature within 10 feet of the exarch the exarch may choose to enter a defensive stance, gaining a +2 bonus to their AC against melee attacks until the start of their next turn. However while in this defensive stance the exarch cannot use their multiattack action.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either an elven glaive and a triskele or a pair of mirror swords

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch uses banshee's howl if it can and then makes three melee attacks, two with its elven glaive and one with its triskele or three with its mirror swords.
If it is armed with a triskele it may instead make two ranged attacks with it.

action.name: Elven Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Triskele
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mirror Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage. The exarch may re-roll damage die of a 1 with this weapon.

action.name: Banshee's Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: Each hostile creature within 15 feet of the exarch must succeed a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Slow and Purposeful
entries: If the elven dark reaper moves no more than half their movement speed on their turn, they make ranged attacks with advantage until the end of their turn.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven dark reaper has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven dark reaper to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven dark reaper makes two ranged attacks with its reaper bow using starswarm arrows.

action.name: Reaper Bow - Starshot Arrow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 15 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Reaper Bow - Starswarm Arrows
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Slow and Purposeful
entries: If the exarch moves no more than half their movement speed on their turn, they make ranged attacks with advantage until the end of their turn.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Night Vision
entries: The exarch can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

trait.name: Fast Shot
entries: Once per turn when the exarch makes a ranged weapon attack as part of the attack or multiattack action, they may make one additional attack with that weapon as part of that action.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either a reaper bow with both starshot and starswarm arrows or with a heavy shuriken crossbow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes two ranged attacks with its reaper bow using starswarm arrows or three ranged attacks with its heavy shuriken crossbow.

action.name: Reaper Bow - Starshot Arrow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 15 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Reaper Bow - Starswarm Arrows
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Shuriken Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven harlequin makes two attacks with its elven blade.

action.name: Elven Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Dance of Death {@recharge}
entries: The elven harlequin moves up to 15 feet towards a creature without provoking opportunity attacks and makes an attack with its elven blade against it; on a hit the creature is knocked {@condition prone}. It may then do this again up to 4 more times as part of this action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven harlequin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven harlequin to sleep.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven harlequin may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Furious Charge
entries: If the elven harlequin moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

trait.name: Flip Belt
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain doesn't cost the elven harlequin extra feet of movement.

trait.name: Mirror-Robes
entries: The elven harlequin gains a +2 bonus to its AC and dexterity saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The elven harlequin may disengage as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven harlequin makes three attacks with its harlequin's kiss.

action.name: Harlequin's Kiss
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage. If any of this weapon's damage dice roll their maximum, then elven harlequin may roll one additional damage die.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Dance of Death {@recharge}
entries: The elven harlequin moves up to 15 feet towards a creature without provoking opportunity attacks and makes an attack with its harlequin's kiss against it, on a hit the creature is knocked {@condition prone}. It may then do this again up to 5 more times as part of this action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven harlequin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven harlequin to sleep.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven harlequin may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Furious Charge
entries: If the elven harlequin moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

trait.name: Flip Belt
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain doesn't cost the elven harlequin extra feet of movement.

trait.name: Mirror-Robes
entries: The elven harlequin gains a +2 bonus to its AC and dexterity saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The elven harlequin may disengage as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven harlequin makes three attacks with its miststave.

action.name: Miststave
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands. On a hit the target must succeed a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn. Attacks from this weapon ignore resistance to its damage type, and treat immunity to its damage type as resistance.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Dance of Death {@recharge}
entries: The elven harlequin moves up to 15 feet towards a creature without provoking opportunity attacks and makes an attack with its miststave against it, on a hit the creature is knocked {@condition prone}. It may then do this again up to 5 more times as part of this action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven harlequin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven harlequin to sleep.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven harlequin may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Furious Charge
entries: If the elven harlequin moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

trait.name: Flip Belt
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain doesn't cost the elven harlequin extra feet of movement.

trait.name: Mirror-Robes
entries: The elven harlequin gains a +2 bonus to its AC and dexterity saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The elven harlequin may disengage as a bonus action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elven harlequin is an 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It the following spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven harlequin uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes either three attacks with its shrieker crossbow - shuriken, one with its shrieker crossbow - shrieker or three unarmed strikes.

action.name: Shrieker Crossbow - Shuriken
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 6}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Shrieker Crossbow - Shrieker
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.
On a hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or have their movement speed reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.
If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by an attack from this weapon, they explode and each creature within 5 feet of them takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the elven harlequin's choice that is within 60 feet of the elven harlequin and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the elven harlequin's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven harlequin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven harlequin to sleep.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven harlequin may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Furious Charge
entries: If the elven harlequin moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

trait.name: Flip Belt
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain doesn't cost the elven harlequin extra feet of movement.

trait.name: Mirror-Robes
entries: The elven harlequin gains a +2 bonus to its AC and dexterity saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The elven harlequin may disengage as a bonus action.

trait.name: Precision Shots
entries: The elven harlequin may re-roll an attack roll that missed once per turn. They may instead roll an attack with advantage once per turn.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven fire dragon adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven fire dragon may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven fire dragon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven fire dragon to sleep.

trait.name: Assured Destruction
entries: The elven fire dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Fusion Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) fire damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. If damage from this weapon kills a target, the target and all of its nonmagical belongings are turned to ash.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Assured Destruction
entries: The exarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either a firepike or dragon's breath.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes two ranged or melee attacks.

action.name: Firepike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) fire damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. If damage from this weapon kills a target, the target and all of its nonmagical belongings are turned to ash.

action.name: Dragon's Breath
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven ranger adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven ranger may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven ranger has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven ranger to sleep.

trait.name: Precision Shots
entries: The elven ranger may re-roll an attack roll using their longbow that missed once per turn. They may instead roll an attack with advantage once per turn.

trait.name: Silent Hunter
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain does not cost the elven ranger extra feet of movement.
Additionally the elven ranger may hide as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shrouded
entries: The elven ranger is considered to be in half cover against ranged attacks even if they are in the open. If elven ranger is in cover, it is considered to be one degree more protective; for example if they are in half cover, it is considered to be three-quarters cover.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven guardian adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven guardian may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven guardian has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven guardian to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven guardian makes two ranged attacks with its shuriken crossbow.

action.name: Shuriken Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven guardian adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven guardian may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven guardian has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven guardian to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven guardian makes two ranged attacks with its shuriken crossbow.

action.name: Elven Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven swooping hawk adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven swooping hawk may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven swooping hawk has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven swooping hawk to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven swooping hawk makes three ranged attacks with its radiant rifle.

action.name: Radiant Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Skyleap {@recharge}
entries: The elven swooping hawk launches itself up to 70 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and can fly up to double its movement speed.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Night Vision
entries: The exarch can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The exarch can take the disengage action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either a hawk's talon or a sunrifle.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes three ranged attacks with its hawk's talon, three ranged attacks with its sunrifle or two melee attacks with its elven blade.

action.name: Sunrifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) radiant damage. On a hit the target must succeed a DC Constitution saving throw, or be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Hawk's Talon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Elven Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Skyleap {@recharge}
entries: The elven swooping hawk launches itself up to 70 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and can fly up to double its movement speed.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven warp spider adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven warp spider may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven warp spider has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven warp spider to sleep.

trait.name: Warp Jump {@recharge 3}
entries: As a bonus action, the elven warp spider can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The elven warp spider take the disengage action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven warp spider makes two ranged attacks with its death spinner.

action.name: Death Spinner
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target's Dexterity score is lower than 14, this weapon gains a +2 bonus to its damage roll. If a damage die for this weapon rolls its maximum, that die deals double its rolled damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Warp Jump {@recharge 3}
entries: As a bonus action, the exarch can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The exarch take the disengage action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fast Shot
entries: Once per turn when the exarch makes a ranged weapon attack as part of the attack or multiattack action, they may make one additional attack with that weapon as part of that action.

trait.name: Precision Shots
entries: The exarch may re-roll an attack roll that missed once per turn. They may instead roll an attack with advantage once per turn.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The exarch is armed with either a spinneret rifle and a dagger or a twin-linked death spinner and two elven blades.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes two ranged attacks with its spinneret rifle or two ranged attacks with its twin-linked death spinner or two melee attacks with its elven blades.

action.name: Spinneret Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target's Dexterity score is lower than 14, this weapon gains a +2 bonus to its damage roll. If a damage die for this weapon rolls its maximum, that die deals double its rolled damage.

action.name: Twin-linked Death Spinner
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target's Dexterity score is lower than 14, this weapon gains +2 to its damage roll. If a damage die for this weapon rolls its maximum, that die deals double its rolled damage. When making an attack roll with this weapon, the exarch can re-roll one of the dice once.

action.name: Elven Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven warlock adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven warlock may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven warlock has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven warlock to sleep.

trait.name: Rune Armour
entries: The elven warlock gains a +2 bonus to its saving throws (included above).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven warlock makes two attacks.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Witchblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks from this weapon ignore resistance to its damage type, treat immunity to its damage type as resistance and deal double damage to objects and structures.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elven warlock is an 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven spiritseer adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven spiritseer may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven spiritseer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven spiritseer to sleep.

trait.name: Rune Armour
entries: The elven spiritseer gains a +2 bonus to its saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Spirit Mark
entries: As a bonus action the elven spiritseer can mark one creature that it can see within 30 feet. All allied constructs within 120 feet of the spirit seer may re-roll any natural 1s on attack rolls against the target but must accept the second result. The mark lasts until the start of the elven spiritseer's next turn

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elvenspiritseer makes two attacks.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Witch Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands. Attacks from this weapon ignore resistance to its damage type, treat immunity to its damage type as resistance and deal double damage to objects and structures.

Additionally on a hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or start burning. The burning target sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. At the start of each of its turns, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. A creature can end this damage by using its action to repeat the Constitution saving throw to extinguish the flames. These magical flames can't be extinguished by nonmagical means.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elven spiritseer is an 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven farseer adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven farseer may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven farseer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven farseer to sleep.

trait.name: Rune Armour
entries: The elven farseer gains a +2 bonus to its saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Ghosthelm
entries: When the elven farseer makes a saving throw against a spell, instead of rolling they may expend a spell slot equal to the level of the spell to succeed the saving throw.

trait.name: Singing Spear
entries: When used with two hands, the spear gains the reach property. The spear can also be used as a spellcasting focus.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven farseer makes two attacks.

action.name: Singing Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage if used with both hands.
Attacks from this weapon ignore resistance to its damage type, treat immunity to its damage type as resistance and deal double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elven farseer is an 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven autarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven autarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven autarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven autarch to sleep.

trait.name: Equipment
entries: The elven autarch may be equipped with either a Banshee Mask or Mandiblasters. Additionally they also be equipped with either Swooping Hawk Wings or a Warp Jump Harness.

trait.name: Warp Jump (Warp Jump Harness Only) {@recharge 3}
entries: As a bonus action, the elven autarch can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Deadly Sting (Mandiblasters Only)
entries: At the start of their turn, the elven autarch can use their bonus action to make an attack with their scorpion's sting. Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on this attack's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The elven autarch is armed with one ranged weapon and one melee weapon from the following: a Scorpion Sword, an Avenger Shuriken Crossbow, a Radiant Rifle, a Death Spinner, a Fusion Rifle, a Masterwork Elven Blade, or a Reaper Bow with Starswarm Arrows.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven autarch makes four melee attacks, or two ranged attacks with their shuriken hand crossbow, avenger shuriken crossbow, death spinner or reaper bow, or three ranged attacks with their radiant rifle.

action.name: Masterwork Elven Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage. The elven autarch may re-roll damage die of a 1 with this weapon.

action.name: Scorpion Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d4 + 7}) slashing damage. This weapon gives a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included).

action.name: Shuriken Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Avenger Shuriken Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Death Spinner
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage. If the target's Dexterity score is lower than 14, this weapon gains a +2 bonus to its damage roll. If a damage die for this weapon rolls its maximum, that die deals double its rolled damage.

action.name: Fusion Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) fire damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. If damage from this weapon kills a target, the target and all of its nonmagical belongings are turned to ash.

action.name: Radiant Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Reaper Bow - Starswarm Arrows
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scorpion's Sting (Mandiblasters Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 5/10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Banshee's Howl (Banshee Mask Only) {@recharge 5}
entries: Each hostile creature within 15 feet of the elven autarch must succeed a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Skyleap (Swooping Hawk Wings Only) {@recharge}
entries: The elven autarch launches itself up to 70 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and can fly up to double its movement speed.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The elven autarch adds 4 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the elven autarch must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Wraithcannon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) force damage. On a critical hit, if the target has 50 hit points or fewer it must succeed a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or die instantly.

action.name: Distortion Scythe
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target rolls a natural 1 on the saving throw and has 50 hit points or fewer it must succeed a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or die instantly.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The elven wraithguard is armed with either a wraithcannon or a distortion-scythe.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The elven wraithguard is armed with either a pair of ghostblades or a ghostaxe and shield.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The elven wraithblade's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven wraithblade makes two attacks with its ghostblades.

action.name: Ghostblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ghostaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven harlequin can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes six melee attacks.

action.name: Harlequin's Kiss
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage. If any of this weapon's damage dice roll their maximum, then elven harlequin may roll one additional damage die.

action.name: Harlequin's Caress
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) force damage. If a damage die for this weapon rolls its maximum, that die deals double its rolled damage.

action.name: Dance of Death {@recharge}
entries: The elven harlequin moves up to 15 feet towards a creature without provoking opportunity attacks and makes an attack with its harlequin's kiss or harlequin's caress against it, on a hit the creature is knocked {@condition prone}. It may then do this again up to 6 more times as part of this action.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the elven harlequin's choice that is within 60 feet of the elven harlequin and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the elven harlequin's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven harlequin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven harlequin to sleep.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven harlequin may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Furious Charge
entries: If the elven harlequin moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

trait.name: Flip Belt
entries: Moving through non-magical difficult terrain doesn't cost the elven harlequin extra feet of movement.

trait.name: Mirror-Robes
entries: The elven harlequin gains a +2 bonus to its AC and Dexterity saving throws (included above).

trait.name: Hit & Run
entries: The elven harlequin may disengage as a bonus action.

trait.name: Eternal Warrior
entries: When the elven harlequin is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead. The elven harlequin must finish a long rest before it can use this part of the trait again.
Additionally if the elven harlequin takes damage that is greater than half its hit point maximum, it instead takes half its hit point maximum in damage.

trait.name: Impossible Form
entries: The elven harlequin gains a +3 bonus to its AC and has advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The elven wraithlord's melee weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven wraithblade makes three attacks with its ghostglaive or four attacks with its shuriken crossbows and one with its brightlance.

action.name: Ghostglaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shuriken Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Brightlance
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The elven shining spear adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The elven shining spear may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven shining spear has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the elven shining spear to sleep.

trait.name: Mounted
entries: The elven shining spear is mounted on a {@creature windrider warhorse|FFEldar}.

trait.name: Skilled Rider
entries: When mounted the elven shining spear gains advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures and has advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off its mount.

trait.name: Acrobatic Grace
entries: While mounted, the exarch and its mount are considered to be in half cover if they have moved at least 5 feet on their previous turn.

action.name: Radiant Lance
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) piercing damage in melee, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) radiant damage at range.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Wind Rider
entries: The horse may Dash, Disengage or Dodge as bonus actions on its turn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Battle Focus
entries: The exarch adds its proficiency bonus to its initiative rolls.

trait.name: Fleet
entries: The exarch may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The exarch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the exarch to sleep.

trait.name: Mounted
entries: The exarch is mounted on a {@creature windrider warhorse|FFEldar}.

trait.name: Skilled Rider
entries: When mounted the exarch spear gains advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures and has advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off its mount.

trait.name: Disarming Strike
entries: Once per turn, when the exarch hits a creature with a melee attack they can force them to succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one object of the exarch's choice. The object lands at its feet.

trait.name: Monster Hunter
entries: The exarch may re-roll damage die and choose the highest on attacks against creatures that are one or more sizes larger than them.

trait.name: Acrobatic Grace
entries: While mounted, the exarch and its mount are considered to be in half cover if they have moved at least 5 feet on their previous turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exarch makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Star Lance
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) piercing damage in melee, or 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) radiant damage at range.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The elven wraithlord's melee weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven wraithblade makes three attacks with its ghostspear or it casts a spell and makes one attack with its brightlance.

action.name: Ghostspear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) slashing damage. The elven wraithseer may re-roll damage die of a 1 with this weapon. Attacks with this weapon deal double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Brightlance
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elven wraithseer is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spell.name: Dread
entries: You point to two creatures you can see within range and fill them with terrible trepidation. Each creature must make a Wisdom saving throw, taking {@damage 3d8} psychic damage on a failed save, becoming {@condition frightened} of you and having their movement speed reduced to 0 until the spell ends.
A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the spell ends for that creature.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.
